name: Nightout
storyline: One day, there were two siblings on vacation at the cottage, then at night his younger brother Andy mysteriously disappeared, and his sister had to look for him and then she teleported to another dimension.
summary: NightOUT game is about two siblings who are staying at the Villa without his parents knowing, then when they sleep at night, his Brother(Andy) is kidnapped by a ghost, and his Sister(Jessica) only realized it when his Brother had disappeared, then the sister finds his brother on the Forest Mountains were very, very dark, suddenly the older was teleported to another world where his sister was in that world.
